name: io.github.crashbytes/pusher-mcp-server
title: Pusher Channels
description: Trigger events, query channels, and manage realtime messaging on Pusher Channels.

environmentVariables.name: PUSHER_CLUSTER
environmentVariables.description: Pusher cluster region (e.g. us2, eu, ap1)

tools.name: trigger_event
tools.description: Send an event to one or more Pusher channels

tools.name: trigger_batch_events
tools.description: Send up to 10 events in a single API call

tools.name: list_channels
tools.description: List all active channels with optional prefix filter

tools.name: get_channel_info
tools.description: Get detailed info about a specific channel

tools.name: get_presence_users
tools.description: List users connected to a presence channel

tools.name: authorize_channel
tools.description: Generate auth tokens for private/presence channels

tools.name: terminate_user_connections
tools.description: Disconnect all connections for a specific user
